title: Better connections with new Bendigo bus timetables
articleContent:
From 29 January 2020, some Bendigo town bus services will have updated timetables, to improve connections to train services.

Route 70 will also have a morning and afternoon deviation on school days to connect students to La Trobe University and Bendigo South East College.

To access your new timetables, follow the links below and enter the date you want to travel:

  • Route 5 Huntly to Kangaroo Flat via Bendigo Station
  • Route 50 Bendigo Station to Epsom Station via Goynes Road
  • Route 51 Bendigo Station to Eaglehawk via Jackass Flat
  • Route 52 Bendigo Station to Eaglehawk via Arnold Street
  • Route 54 Bendigo Station to Maiden Gully via Calder Highway
  • Route 55 Bendigo Station to Kangaroo Flat via Golden Square
  • Route 62 Bendigo Station to Spring Gully via La Trobe University
  • Route 63 Bendigo Hospital to La Trobe University via Bendigo Station
  • Route 70 Bendigo Station to Strathfieldsaye
  • Route 71 Strathfieldsaye and Junortoun Loop
  • Heathcote to Bendigo via Junortoun and Axedale and Knowsley
